sentence.Network_en: He commented that it was about time he left that accursed woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说自己是时候离开那个恶女人了。

sentence.Network_en: Then you condemn me to live wretched and to die accursed?
sentence.Network_cn: 那么你就是判定我活着受罪,死后要受诅咒了?

sentence.Network_en: There was one accursed deed done at this spot before now.
sentence.Network_cn: 从前这块地方发生过一桩骇人听闻的事件.

list.abs: it is natural for you to say so ; yet do not interrupt me , let me finish my accursed history .你当然会这么说：可是不要打岔，让我把这该死的故事讲完。
the accursed shark alone in any generic respect be said to bear comprarative analogy the dog .就一般情况说来，只有那种可恶的鲨鱼，才可以说是具有跟狗相似的癖性。
I despised myself and the voices of my accursed human education ., i 看不起自己和声音 , 我准人的教育.
but , now the house burned down , he was tired of the' accursed place' , and would be most happy to get it off his hands .但是现在，房子烧成了灰烬，他厌烦了这个“倒霉的地方”，非常高兴能将它脱手。

means.word_mean: 受责的,被诅咒的,邪恶的
恶毒的,可怕的,令人厌恶的

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : past participle of obsolete accurse, from a- (expressing intensity) + curse

entry.def: Some people use accursed to describe something which they are very annoyed about.

example.ex: He commented that it was about time he left that accursed woman.
example.tran: 他说自己是时候离开那个恶女人了。

entry.def: If a person is accursed, they have been cursed.

auth_sentence.content: Its family resemblance keeps it near Yet free from all the menaces accursed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Its family resemblance keeps it near Yet free from all the menaces accursed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Its family resemblance keeps it near Yet free from all the menaces accursed.

auth_sentence.content: They'd yearned to see the sweet and accursed old teams have at each other in their grand old parks a lore-off, so to speak.
